claimForm.title: Claim Registration Form
claimForm.description: Please fill out the form below to claim your free health care.

diagnosis_date.label: Diagnosis Date
diagnosis_date.description: Provide the date when the diagnosis was made.

diagnosis_code.label: Diagnosis Code
diagnosis_code.description: Provide the code for the diagnosis.
diagnosis_code.error: Diagnosis code is required and must be valid.

diagnosis_category.label: Diagnosis Category
diagnosis_category.description: Specify the category of the diagnosis.

diagnosis_source.label: Diagnosis Source
diagnosis_source.description: Specify the source of the diagnosis.

diagnosis_description.label: Diagnosis Description
diagnosis_description.description: Provide a detailed description of the diagnosis.

lonic_code.label: LOINC Code
lonic_code.description: Provide the LOINC code associated with the diagnosis.

lonic_category.label: LOINC Category
lonic_category.description: Provide the LOINC category associated with the diagnosis.

lonic_description.label: LOINC Description
lonic_description.description: Provide a detailed description of the LOINC code.

other_diagnosis_codes_poc.label: Other Diagnosis Description
other_diagnosis_codes_poc.error: Other diagnosis description must be valid.

admitting_diagnosis.label: Admitting Diagnosis Description
admitting_diagnosis.description: Specify the diagnosis Description upon admission.

attending_provider_name_npi_specialty_co.label: Attending Provider Name , or NPI
attending_provider_name_npi_specialty_co.description: Provide the name, NPI, and specialty code of the attending provider.

treatment_details.label: Treatment Details
treatment_details.description: Provide a detailed description of the treatment.

service_start_date.label: Service Start Date
service_start_date.description: Specify the date the service started.

service_end_date.label: Service End Date
service_end_date.description: Specify the date the service ended.

service_charge.label: Service Charge
service_charge.description: Specify the charge for the service.
service_charge.error: Service charge must be a valid amount.

revenue_center_description.label: Revenue Center Description
revenue_center_description.description: The revenue code belongs to the associated provider.

other_provider_ids.label: Other Provider IDs
other_provider_ids.description: Provide the IDs of other associated providers.
other_provider_ids.error: Other provider IDs must be valid.

treatment_authorization_codes.label: Treatment Authorization Codes
treatment_authorization_codes.description: Provide authorization codes for the treatment.

patient_discharge_status.label: Patient Discharge Status
patient_discharge_status.description: Specify the discharge status of the patient.

source_of_admission.label: Source of Admission
source_of_admission.description: Provide the source of the patient's admission.

type_of_admission_visit.label: Type of Admission/Visit
type_of_admission_visit.placeholder: Enter the type of admission or visit
type_of_admission_visit.description: Specify the type of admission or visit.
type_of_admission_visit.error: Type of admission or visit is required.

patient_control_number.label: Patient Control Number
patient_control_number.description: Provide the control number assigned to the patient.

billing_provider_name.label: Billing Provider Name
billing_provider_name.description: Provide the name of the billing provider.

attending_provider_name.label: Attending Provider Name
attending_provider_name.description: Provide the name of the attending provider.

attending_provider_npi.label: Attending Provider NPI
attending_provider_npi.description: Provide the NPI of the attending provider.

attending_provider_tin_number.label: Attending Provider TIN / Tax ID
attending_provider_tin_number.placeholder: Enter the attending provider TIN / Tax ID
attending_provider_tin_number.description: Provide the TIN / Tax ID of the attending provider.
attending_provider_tin_number.error: Attending provider tin / Tax ID is required

patient_reason_for_visit.label: Patient Reason for Visit
patient_reason_for_visit.description: Provide the indicating the reason for the visit.

cpt_code.label: CPT Code
cpt_code.description: Provide the Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) code.

cpt_category.label: CPT Category
cpt_category.description: Specify the category associated with the CPT code.

cpt_description.label: CPT Description
cpt_description.description: Provide a description for the CPT code.

external_cause_of_injury_code.label: External Cause of Injury Code
external_cause_of_injury_code.placeholder: Enter the external cause of injury code
external_cause_of_injury_code.description: Provide the code indicating the external cause of injury.
external_cause_of_injury_code.error: External cause of injury code is required.

principal_procedure_code.label: Principal Procedure Code
principal_procedure_code.description: Provide the code for the principal procedure performed.

other_procedure_code.label: Other Procedure Code
other_procedure_code.description: Provide codes for additional procedures performed.
other_procedure_code.error: Other procedure codes must be valid.

other_procedure_code_description.label: Other Procedure Code Description
other_procedure_code_description.placeholder: Enter descriptions for other procedure codes
other_procedure_code_description.description: Provide detailed descriptions for other procedure codes.
other_procedure_code_description.error: Descriptions for other procedure codes are required.

operating_physician_name_npi_specialty_c.label: Operating Physician Name or NPI
operating_physician_name_npi_specialty_c.placeholder: Enter the operating physician's Name or NP
operating_physician_name_npi_specialty_c.description: Provide the name, NPI, and specialty code of the operating physician.

other_provider_name_npi_specialty.label: Other Provider Name or NPI
other_provider_name_npi_specialty.description: Provide the name, NPI, and specialty code of other providers.

type_of_bill.label: Type of Bill
type_of_bill.description: Specify the type of bill for the services provided.

billing_provider_npi.label: Billing Provider NPI
billing_provider_npi.description: Provide the NPI of the billing provider.

place_of_service_description.label: Place of Service Description
place_of_service_description.placeholder: Enter the place of service description
place_of_service_description.description: Provide a description for the place of service.
place_of_service_description.error: Place of service description is required.

place_of_service_code.label: Place of Service Code
place_of_service_code.placeholder: place of service code will be field when you select the description
place_of_service_code.description: Provide the code for the place of service.
place_of_service_code.error: Place of service code must be valid.

payer_name.label: Payer Name
payer_name.description: Specify the name of the payer.

release_of_information_certification.label: Release of Information Certification
release_of_information_certification.placeholder: Enter the release of information certification
release_of_information_certification.description: Provide the certification details for the release of information.
release_of_information_certification.error: Release of information certification is required.

receipts.label: Payment Receipts
receipts.description: Attach receipts as proof of payment or charges.

medication_prescription.label: Medication Prescription
medication_prescription.description: Attach medication prescription as proof of payment or charges.

revenue_code_tin_number.label: Revenue Code TIN Number
revenue_code_tin_number.placeholder: Enter the revenue code TIN number
revenue_code_tin_number.description: Provide the TIN number associated with the revenue code.
revenue_code_tin_number.error: Revenue code TIN number is required.

non_covered_charges.label: Non-Covered Charges
non_covered_charges.description: Specify charges that are not covered.

exam_and_lab.label: Examination and Lab report
exam_and_lab.placeholder: Please upload Examination and lab reports

medical_imaging.label: Medical Imaging
medical_imaging.description: Attach the Medical Imaging eg.(CT Scan, MRI)

referralForm.title: Referral Form
referralForm.description: Please fill out the form below to refer a memmber.

referral_date.label: Referral Date
referral_date.description: Provide the date when the referral was made.

referral_status.label: Referral Status
referral_status.error: please select the Referral Status. It is required

reason_for_referral.label: Reason for Referral
reason_for_referral.description: Provide a detailed description of the referral.

referred_to.label: Referred To
referred_to.description: Provide the Provider the referral is to.

priorAuthForm.title: Prior Authorization Request Form
priorAuthForm.description: Please fill out the form below to request a prior authorization.

date_of_service.label: Date of Service
date_of_service.description: Provide the date when the service was made.

reason_for_request.label: Reason for Request
reason_for_request.description: Provide a detailed description of the request.

appealForm.title: Appeal Form
appealForm.description: Please fill out the form below to appeal your free health care.

reason_for_appeal.label: Reason for Appeal
reason_for_appeal.description: Provide a detailed description of the Appeal.

appointmentForm.title: Appointment Booking Form
appointmentForm.description: Please fill out the form below to appeal your free health care.

member_question.label: Has the member been enrolled in our health insurance plan before?

doctor_name.label: Attending Provider Name , or NPI
doctor_name.placeholder: Enter a Provider that will be seeing the member
doctor_name.description: Which provider will the member be seeing for the appointment?

service_type.label: Type of Service
service_type.description: What type of service is the member requesting?
service_type.error: please select Type of Service. It is required

appointment_location.label: Preference Inquiry
appointment_location.description: How does the member prefer to have your appointment in person or online?
appointment_location.error: please select Appointment Location. It is required

reason_for_appointmnet.label: Reason for Appointment
reason_for_appointmnet.description: Provide a detailed description of the Appointment.

contact_type.label: Preferred Contact Method
contact_type.placeholder: Select the type of Preferred Contact Method
contact_type.error: please select Contact Method. It is required

claimStatusForm.title: Claim Status
claimStatusForm.description: Please fill out the form below to check the status of a claim.
